tweet: With leadership everywhere, working as one, being citizen-focused and bringing a growth mindset to our work, we can truly make a difference in the lives of those we serve. #NDbudget #NDpol

tweet: In sum: this budget recommendation invests in our people, modernizes our infrastructure and replenishes our rainy-day fund without raising taxes. #NDbudget #NDpol

tweet: The Theodore Roosevelt Presidential Library will inspire the world to dare greatly, think boldly, live passionately and care deeply. #NDbudget #NDpol
